description: The GN042 windshield  suction car mounting pedestal is compatible with Garmin nuvi devices  having the 17mm swivel ball mounting pattern, including models in the  40, 50, 200, 2013, 24x5, and 25x5 Series, as well as Garmin nuvi models  1450, 1450T, 1490T, 1200, 1250, 1260T, 1300, 1350, 1350T, 1370T, and  1390T. (The above listed Garmin nuvi devices should include a 17mm  swivel-ball-compatible mount bracket; replacement brackets and holders  sold separately.) This mount package includes Arkon’s Windshield Suction  Mount with 8.5” Flexible Gooseneck. The windshield mounting pedestal  features PVC suction and an 8.5” flexible gooseneck, which is ideal for  placement on deep or slanted windshields. The windshield suction  mounting pedestal provides 360° rotation, giving you the ultimate  flexibility in viewing the Garmin GPS from any angle.
title: Arkon GPS Car Mount for Garmin nuvi 40 50 200 2013 24x5 25x5 Series GPS Windshield Suction Mount with Flexible Gooseneck
